title: [BUG] Howling Abyss Cassio Bot
body:
Hey everyone,

I just tried playing 2 games of howling abyss with bots in a custom game.
Boths time I've added bot Cassiopeia, and both times she did not buy any item except Doran's ring.

Matches history :

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/161564836/7410175?tab=overview

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/161564798/7410175?tab=overview

What is funny is somehow she always was top damages for her team and a decent score.. balanced I guess ? :)

Cheers !

replies.body: YOU CAN PUT BOTS ON THE HOWLING ABYSS WHAT
Ah, not on the old client.
